description:
Hayato and Ui are enjoying a relaxing evening at home eating dinner and studying. But they`re bothered by Rin`s numerous visits to her sister`s place next door.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seitoukaichou no Ganbari to Fuyu no Yuuwaku
The President`s Efforts and Winter`s Temptations
Une présidente qui prépare le petit-déjeuner
生徒会長の頑張りと冬の誘惑
